name: deep-learning-playground
description: Web Application where people new to Deep Learning can input a dataset and toy around with basic Pytorch modules through a drag and drop interface.

scripts.build:prod: cd frontend/playground-frontend && yarn install && REACT_APP_MODE=prod yarn run build
scripts.installb: conda --version && cd conda && conda env create -f environment.yml && pre-commit install
scripts.secrets: eval "$(conda shell.bash hook)" && conda activate dlplayground && python -m backend.aws_helpers.aws_secrets_utils.build_env
scripts.startb: eval "$(conda shell.bash hook)" && conda activate dlplayground && python -m backend.driver

author: https://github.com/DSGT-DLP/Deep-Learning-Playground/blob/main/CODEOWNERS
